name: V-Tess alpha
description:
Are you fast enough to escape from the ominous entity that chases you?!

It's time to get good fast. Run, jump, swing and slide and keep up your momentum in order to get through each of these challenging levels .

This game is in alpha so it may not work as expected. Additionally, there are still many more levels to be added in the future so try coming back soon and you might find a juicy update.

I built a game engine alongside this game. You can check out Mechanica Game Engine  on GitHub if you're interested in 2D game development with Kotlin

If you are interested in the sound track, most of the music was created by LLYDIA and the menu music was created by Anttis and a masive thanks to them for providing the music for free
